titles.title: When the Roll Is Called Up Yonder (James M. Black)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound, And time shall be no more, And the morning breaks eternal bright and fair. When the saints on earth shall gather Over on the other shore, And the roll is called up yonder I’ll be there.{/lang-eng}
